text: Rajesh Raman Pillai (10 July 1974 - 27 February 2016) was an Indian movie director. He was best known for his work in Malayalam cinema. He was known for his movie Traffic (2011). Pillai died on 27 February 2016 at a hospital in Kochi, India. He had liver disease. He was aged 41. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Indian movie directors
title: Rajesh Pillai
